name: pushpulljs
description: Convenience tool to make your files content flexible

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm audit && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.update-lock: node bin/cli.js .npmrc --on '#WRITE_LOCK' && npm i && npm ddp && node bin/cli.js .npmrc --off '#WRITE_LOCK'
scripts.upgrade-lock: node bin/cli.js .npmrc --on '#WRITE_LOCK' && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm ddp && node bin/cli.js .npmrc --off '#WRITE_LOCK'

author: Richard Lindner <rlindner81@gmail.com>
